text.text_translated:
One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins changed TV channels.  
It was when the US attacked Iraq.  
She could only find shows with real people, not people who act.  
The shows had young people trying to win a million dollars.  
She also saw news about the war.  
She says the two shows started to mix in a scary way.  
The idea for The Hunger Games came to her.  
The Hunger Games is a story about a competition.
